basic_information.scholarship_name: Finney Scholars Scholarship for Modern Languages

description: This scholarship honors Dr. Frank Finney, Jr. In 1971, he became the first dean of the newly-formed College of Liberal Arts. Dr. Finney was passionate about developing the creative potential of students and giving them a sound background in their academic disciplines. "The Finney" recognizes Liberal Arts students who are identified as having a proven record of high academic achievement in their major. Eligibility Requirements Modern Languages major Minimum 3.5 GPA in major Minimum 3.5 overall GPA Full-time undergraduate or graduate student in good standing with the University Show evidence of excellence in the discipline as determined by the department Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
